price: (gabrooni Rabbii) isaan ragaa cubbuu hin baaneefi yeroo tapha bira qaxxaamuranis kabajaadhaan qaxxaamuraniidha.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yashhadūna al-zūra wa-idhā marrū bil-laghwi marrū kirāman
